title: Megaphone
summaries: The Megaphone is an immunity accessory that grants the player immunity to the Silenced debuff. It has a 1/100 (1%) / 1/50 (2%) chance to drop from Pixies, Green Jellyfish, Dark Mummies, and Blood Mummies(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

It is one of the ingredients required to make the <linked>Countercurse Mantra</linked>, which is a <linked>crafting material</linked> required to make the <linked>Ankh Charm</linked>, an accessory further required to make the <linked>Ankh Shield</linked>.

While the Megaphone is exclusive to <linked>Hardmode</linked> on the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, it can be obtained in <linked>pre-Hardmode</linked> on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked> by throwing a <linked>Nazar</linked> into <linked>Shimmer</linked>.
